summary: Changes stats of all base armor and weapons in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will change characteristics of Hide, Forsworn, Fur, Studded, Stormcloak, Imperial equipment, Leather, makes Falmer armor Falmer Light, Elven, Scaled, Glass, Dragonscale, Iron, Ancient Nord, Wolf, Steel, Blades, Dwarven, Steel Plate, Orcish, Ebony, Dragonplate and Daedric unenchanted armor and weapons. All changes are made for balancing purposes. List of all changes is included with mod.

Check out my other mods for Morrowind, Oblivion, Skyrim and Skyrim SE:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/8650363?tab=user+files]mithrilarmor[/url]
author: mithrilarmor
